"Chronicles of the Great Wilderness" - The journey of cultivation, easy to hang up the new experience  (Qqun: 1146898292)

"Chronicles of the Great Wilderness" is a multi-play combination of placement multiplayer online role playing game (MMORPG), allowing you to experience the fun of hanging up in the reality world.

Game Features:

Raiders of the Lost Ark: Explore the mysterious replica, unlock the door to the secret world, and search for the legendary treasure.

Pet companion: Collect all kinds of cute pets, fight alongside them, and grow together.

Easy to hang up: Automatically open treasure chest, hang up upgrade, enjoy worry-free game experience.

Replica Adventure: Challenge unlimited copies to unlock more difficulties and win big rewards.

Daily surprise: The mysterious treasure chest is dug every day, the surprise is constantly, the fun is upgraded.

Community co-creation: Discuss and suggest with other players to enrich the game world together.

You can experience the new fun of placing RPG here, whether it is equipment synthesis, magic weapon advancement or pet cultivation, it can be easily done.

Welcome to the Wilderness and start your journey to the truth. Here, you will explore, challenge and harvest with a large number of players, and experience the fun of placing games like never before.
